Airbomber: Huh? No, no! I gave him a left, and then a right! I killed him..=
.

Airbomber paused, thinking of something to say.

Airbomber: Oh, yeah! He=
 begged me! He said "no! Don't! I can't be killed by you! Please let me go =
exalted great one!" But then I said "no essa! You are going to die! And it =
will be at my hands!" Then I knocked his head off! It killed him, you shoul=
d have seen it!...

bject: Time Warp finds Airbomber/Chromedome proposes an alliance/Winterhart=



  :::Time Warp/The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
  Lynx/Orion=
/Winterhart::: 

  ::Time Warp hears Airbobmber shout. He runs to his posti=
on:: 
  Time Warp: There you are, brother.  So, you were absorbed by that m=
onster bot 
  too? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Maximals all breathe a sigh of releif w=
hen they watch the Alliance pull 
  out:: 
  Ratchet: Phew, that battle was=
 TOO LONG! 
  Sideswipe: Agreed, my friend. 
  Sky Lynx: Eh, it wasnt SO ba=
d. 
  Torca: C'mon Sky Lynx, your as damaged as the rest of us. 
  Orion: Y=
eah, get control of your ego. 
  Sky Lynx: Sorry, your right. 
  ::Chromedo=
me walks up to Iron Raptor:: 
  Chromedome: You did well in this battle.  A=
ll the orders made by you were for 
  the good of everyone. I havent seen a=
 leader as good as you since my days 
  with Fortress Maximus, and my group=
 and i would be honored to serve you.  An 
  alliance.  Do you accept my of=
fer? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::The stasis pods DNA scanners reactivate, and they scan a=
 white rabbit. The 
  new Maximal climbs out. She looks around:: 
  Winterh=
art: This must be earth. Winterhart, maximize! 
  ::She transforms into ver=
y beautiful female robot mode and heads for the CF, 
  with only instinct g=
uiding her::
